name: programming update
notification: We have received new code from the supply drop! (+[cultureAmount] code)

name: technology update
notification: We have found blueprints for [techName] in the supply drop!
uniques: [1] free random researchable Tech(s) from the [Exploring era]

name: labor reinforcements
notification: A [Labor Drone] has been sent to join us!
uniques: Free [Labor Drone] found in the ruins

name: factory founder reinforcements
notification: A [Mobile Constructor] has been sent to join us!
uniques: Free [Mobile Constructor] found in the ruins

name: combat logs for exploring unit
notification: Our unit found combat logs in the supply drop!

name: factory reinforcements (adds population to a factory)
notification: We have received a new unit in the supply drop! Population added to [cityName].

name: additional data
notification: We have received an installment of [goldAmount] Data from the supply drop!

name: advanced weaponry for exploring unit
notification: Our unit finds advanced weaponry in the supply drop!
uniques: [This Unit] upgrades for free including special upgrades

name: reveal nearby Rogue robot factories
notification: We have received intel about Rogue robot activity. Nearby Rogue robot factories are revealed!
uniques: Reveal up to [All] [Barbarian encampment] within a [10] tile radius

name: receive geographical intel
notification: We have received data about nearby geography from the supply drop!
uniques: From a randomly chosen tile [4] tiles away from the ruins, reveal tiles up to [4] tiles away with [80]% chance

name: building materials
notification: We have found useful building materials in the supply drop!
